newsitem.title: CANADA: Greenstone expands Nicaragua gold prospects.
newsitem.headline: Greenstone expands Nicaragua gold prospects.

text.p: Greenstone Resources Ltd said on Tuesday that exploration at its Libertad gold project in Nicaragua continues to expand the known areas of mineralization.
Drilling at the Cerro Mojon section of the project was expected to lead to an expansion of a planned mine, the company said.

The company initially outlined 936,000 ounces of geologic gold reserves, but it now expected the deposit to contain 2.5 million ounces of geologic reserves and up to two million ounces of minable reserves.
The company said it expected an early decision to expand production capacity.
Greenstone also said exploration at the property's Chamarro structure struck wide zones of mineralized quartz stockwork.
